title: How is Pradeep's fundamental physics for JEE Mains and advance? - Quora

response.answer_text: Pradeep is not very useful considering JEE point of view, there are several other books for physics other than Pradeep for JEE Mains and advance. Try DC Pandey and HCV. However you can refer Pradeep for ncert solutions as well as some derivations which are not clear in ncert. You can also refer Pradeep for logical and short question answers.
